name: Hattie
description:
This game was made in 12 hours for VimJam.

Theme: Collectables

Hattie Ham Pattie has found himself in a nightmare!

His pickles are missing and he needs to find them while avoiding the traps which will surely lead to his destruction. 

Help Hattie find his pickles and avoid becoming beef crumbles.

WASD or Arrow Keys to move

Shift to Sprint

Space to Jump

Music by. Lizzy Roni

Art by. Brennen

This game was made in 12 hours and we plan on adding more levels and adding polishing after the VimJam rating period.

Thank you for playing!
